mapper.insert: insert into Pds (title, userid, contents, fname1, fname2, fname3, fsize1, fsize2, fsize3, ftype1, ftype2, ftype3, uuid) values (#{title}, #{userid}, #{contents}, #{fname1}, #{fname2}, #{fname3}, #{fsize1}, #{fsize2}, #{fsize3}, #{ftype1}, #{ftype2}, #{ftype3}, #{uuid});
mapper.select: select pno, title, userid, regdate, thumbs, views from Pds order by pno desc limit #{stratnum}, 10
mapper.update: update Pds set views = views + 1 where pno = #{pno};
mapper.select: select ${order} fname1, uuid from Pds where pno = #{pno};
